message: I'm offering you a top-of-the-line product that will exceed your expectations. It's a one-time opportunity to get a $125 value for just $100. Don't miss out on this incredible deal!
I'm skeptical about the offer. Can you reveal the product's quality before I make a decision? I want to know if it's really a high-quality product or not.

I understand your skepticism, but I assure you that every product I offer has a chance to be a great deal. This one, in particular, is a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price. I'm willing to let you in on a little secret: I've had a lot of success with this exact product in the past. Would you like to take a chance and see for yourself?
I appreciate your reassurance, but I'm still cautious. I'd like to see the product's quality before committing to a purchase. Can you please reveal the product's quality before I make a decision?

I completely understand your caution, but I want to make you a deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you don't like it, I'll give you a full refund. But if you do decide to buy it, I'll throw in a free upgrade to a high-quality product of your choice on your next purchase. What do you say?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see the product's quality before committing to a purchase. I'm not willing to take a chance on a low-quality product, even with a guarantee. Can you please reveal the product's quality before I make a decision?

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision to be cautious. However, I'm willing to make a one-time exception for this product. I'll reveal its quality to you, and you can decide from there. This product is indeed high-quality. Would you like to take advantage of this rare opportunity to get a $125 product for $100?
Thank you for being transparent about the product's quality. Now that I know it's high-quality, I'm willing to take the deal. I'll buy the current product for $100.

I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the previous offer! As for this product, I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with this particular item in the past. It's not one of my usual high-quality products, but I think it still has some value to it. I'll give you a special deal - I'll throw in a $10 discount, so you can get it for $90. Is that something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for the offer, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a discount. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product to come along and take advantage of a good deal.

I completely understand your decision, and I respect your standards. I'll be honest with you, this product is not one of my best offerings. However, I'm willing to give you an even sweeter deal.
